title: Saint Beast: Kouin Jojishi Tenshi Tan
synopsis: A long time ago, Zeus, the great god, created a three–tier hierarchy of angels, top, middle and lower, although they were supposed to be equal. Also, Zeus appointed 6 angels as Saint Beasts who govern the animals of Earth. They were: Go, the seiyu; Shin, the genbu; Rei, the suzaku; Guy, the byakko; Yuda, the kirin; and Ruka, the hooh. However, Kira, the shooting star, and Maya, the fuga, didn’t attend the selection tests and left for the Earth.
voices: ['Miyata, Kouki', 'Midorikawa, Hikaru', 'Yoshino, Hiroyuki', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Kanemaru, Junichi', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Toriumi, Kousuke', 'Suzumura, Kenichi']
